languages.text:
{n}Улыбка становится шире.{/n} "Отважно ступать первым во тьму,
Объединить и вернуть то, что было утрачено,
Возвыситься над невыразимыми кошмарами,
Твердо держать поводья судьбы,
Стойко идти тернистой дорогой,
Через боль — к величию".

{n}Her smile grows wider.{/n} "To walk bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To triumph over nightmares untold,
To hold boldly the reins of fate,
To walk steadily the road of thorns,
Through pain to greatness."
languages.original_text:
{n}Улыбка становится шире.{/n} "Отважно ступать первым во тьму,
Объединить и вернуть то, что было утрачено,
Возвыситься над невыразимыми кошмарами,
Твердо держать поводья судьбы,
Стойко идти тернистой дорогой,
Через боль — к величию".

traits.locale_text:
{n}Her smile grows bigger.{/n} "...Unbroken by adversity,
To walk bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To triumph over nightmares untold,
To hold boldly the reins of fate,
To walk steadily the road of thorns,
Through pain to greatness."

{n}Her smile grows bigger.{/n} "...Unbroken by adversity,
To walk bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To triumph over nightmares untold,
To hold boldly the reins of fate,
To walk steadily the road of thorns,
Through pain to greatness."

{n}Her smile grows bigger.{/n} "To venture bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To triumph over nightmares untold,
To clutch the reins of fate boldly,
To tread the road of thorns firmly,
Through pain to greatness."

{n}Her smile grows bigger.{/n} "To venture bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To triumph over nightmares untold,
To clutch the reins of fate boldly,
To tread the road of thorns firmly,
Through pain to greatness."

{n}Her smile grows wider.{/n} "To walk bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To triumph over nightmares untold,
To hold boldly the reins of fate,
To walk steadily the road of thorns,
Through pain to greatness."

{n}Her smile grows wider.{/n} "To walk bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To triumph over nightmares untold,
To hold boldly the reins of fate,
To walk steadily the road of thorns,
Through pain to greatness."

languages.text:
{n}Son sourire s'élargit encore et elle répond :{/n} « D'avancer en premier dans les ténèbres,
d'unir et de reprendre ce qui a été perdu,
de triompher des cauchemars indicibles,
de tenir les rênes du destin sans faillir,
de franchir résolument les chemins tapissés d'épines
pour atteindre la grandeur. »
languages.original_text:
{n}Her smile grows wider.{/n} "To walk bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To triumph over nightmares untold,
To hold boldly the reins of fate,
To walk steadily the road of thorns,
Through pain to greatness."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Son sourire s'élargit et elle répond :{/n} « Braver tout d'abord la noirceur,
Vous unir et reprendre ce qui a été égaré,
De cauchemars indicibles triompher,
Tenir courageusement les rênes du destin,
Suivre fermement l'épineux chemin,
Endurer la souffrance jusqu'à la grandeur. »

languages.text:
{n}Su sonrisa se ensancha.{/n} «{mf|El|La} primer{mf|o|a} en adentrarme en las sombras,
para unir y recuperar lo que se ha perdido,
triunfar contra pesadillas inefables,
tomar las riendas del destino y
recorrer este espinoso sendero
por el dolor hasta la grandeza».
languages.original_text:
{n}Her smile grows wider.{/n} "To walk bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To triumph over nightmares untold,
To hold boldly the reins of fate,
To walk steadily the road of thorns,
Through pain to greatness."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Su sonrisa se ensancha.{/n} «Adentrarse con valor en la sombra,
unirse para recuperar lo perdido,
triunfar sobre pesadillas traicioneras,
aferrar con fuerza las riendas del destino,
recorrer la senda de espinas con firmeza,
pasando por el dolor para llegar a la gloria».

languages.text:
{n}她的笑容变得更加灿烂。{/n}“心怀勇气，步入黑暗，
夺回失去的一切。
破除无尽的噩梦，
掌控命运的缰绳，
踏平荆棘的道路。
苦尽甘来，成就伟业。”
languages.original_text:
{n}Her smile grows wider.{/n} "To walk bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To triumph over nightmares untold,
To hold boldly the reins of fate,
To walk steadily the road of thorns,
Through pain to greatness."

traits.locale_text:
{n}她的笑容变得更加灿烂。{/n}
“勇敢地踏入黑暗之中，
夺回失去的一切，
战胜无尽的噩梦。
勇敢地抓住命运之缰，
坚定地踏上荆棘之路，
克服痛苦，成就辉煌。

languages.text:
{n}Ihr Lächeln wird breiter.{/n} "mutig als Erster in die Dunkelheit zu schreiten,
Zu vereinen und zurückzuerobern, was verloren ging,
Über ungeahnte Albträume zu triumphieren,
Kühn die Zügel des Schicksals in Händen zu halten,
ohne zu wanken die Straße der Dornen zu beschreiten,
Durch Schmerz zu wahrer Größe."
languages.original_text:
{n}Her smile grows wider.{/n} "To walk bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To triumph over nightmares untold,
To hold boldly the reins of fate,
To walk steadily the road of thorns,
Through pain to greatness."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Ihr Lächeln wächst an.{/n} "Mutig als Erster in die Dunkelheit zu schreiten,
Zu vereinen und zurückzuerobern, was verloren ging,
Über ungeahnte Albträume zu triumphieren,
Kühn die Zügel des Schicksals in Händen zu halten,
Ohne zu wanken die Straße der Dornen zu beschreiten,
Durch Schmerz zu wahrer Größe."

languages.text:
{n}彼女の笑みが広がる。{/n}「勇気を持って暗闇に真っ先に飛び込むため、
失われたものを取り戻すために団結するため、
語られざる悪夢に打ち勝つため、
運命の手綱を大胆に握るため、
茨の道をしっかりと踏みしめるため、
苦痛を乗り越え、大いなるものとなる」
languages.original_text:
{n}Her smile grows wider.{/n} "To walk bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To triumph over nightmares untold,
To hold boldly the reins of fate,
To walk steadily the road of thorns,
Through pain to greatness."

traits.locale_text:
{n}彼女の笑みが広がる。{/n}「勇気を持って暗闇に真っ先に飛び込むため、

languages.text:
{n}Gülümsemesi genişliyor.{/n} "Karanlığa cesurca önden gidecek,
Kaybedilenleri geri alacak ve birleştirecek,
Tarifsiz kâbuslara galebe çalacak,
Kaderin dizginlerini korkmadan tutacak,
Acı dolu yollarda istikrarlı bir şekilde
Izdıraptan yüceliğe yürüyeceğim."
languages.original_text:
{n}Her smile grows wider.{/n} "To walk bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To triumph over nightmares untold,
To hold boldly the reins of fate,
To walk steadily the road of thorns,
Through pain to greatness."
